title: Passarola Rising
description: Inventing a peculiar airship that he uses to escape the intellectually stultifying climate of Portugal, Bartolomeu LourenÇo and his brother, Alexandre, travel the world in search of the truth, from the salons and bordellos of Ancien RÉgime Paris to the Polish kingdom of Stanislaus. A first novel. Reprint. 35,000 first printing.
author: Azhar Abidi
